materials.raw_text:
- Silver (Ag): 80 grams  
  - Cerium (Ce): 40 grams  
  - Antimony (Sb): 160 grams  
  - Samarium (Sm): 40 grams

sourcing.instructions:
- Silver: Obtain from a jewelry supply store or metal supplier.  
  - Cerium: Purchase from a chemical supply company or online vendor.  
  - Antimony: Available from specialty metal suppliers.  
  - Samarium: Can be found at chemical suppliers or rare earth metal suppliers.
